all_featured_events.name: Robotics Workshop
all_featured_events.description: Hands-on workshop on building autonomous robots and automation systems using Arduino and sensors. Participants learned fundamental robotics design principles and practical implementation.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Robotics and Automation Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Workshop on Advanced MATLAB and Simulink for Renewable Energy Research
all_featured_events.description: A professional-level workshop focused on MATLAB and Simulink applications in renewable energy research, modeling, and simulation for sustainable power systems.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Power & Energy Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Power Engineering Seminar
all_featured_events.description: A technical seminar on renewable energy integration, smart grids, and energy storage systems presented by experts from academia and industry.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Power & Energy Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Industrial Innovation and Automation Talk
all_featured_events.description: An industry-driven session focused on industrial automation trends, manufacturing innovation, and modern control systems.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Industry Applications Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Women in Tech Leadership Meetup
all_featured_events.description: A networking and leadership event empowering women in technology through mentorship, panel discussions, and skill development workshops.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Women in Engineering Affinity Group

all_featured_events.name: Line Follower Robot Competition
all_featured_events.description: A fun, competitive event where participants design and build autonomous line-following robots to test their precision and speed.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Robotics and Automation Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Humanitarian Engineering for Change
all_featured_events.description: An initiative focusing on engineering solutions to real-world humanitarian challenges in rural and underserved communities.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Women in Engineering Affinity Group

all_featured_events.name: Administrative Officers Training Program
all_featured_events.description: A leadership and management training workshop for executive members to improve project organization, communication, and event execution.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Power & Energy Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Industry Academia Collaboration Summit
all_featured_events.description: A collaborative platform between academic researchers and industry professionals to discuss innovation, research, and skill-building opportunities.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Industry Applications Society Student Branch Chapter

all_featured_events.name: Tech Talk: Breaking Barriers in STEM
all_featured_events.description: An inspiring talk by women leaders in STEM fields discussing opportunities, challenges, and future pathways for young innovators.
all_featured_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Women in Engineering Affinity Group

all_mega_events.name: National Robotics Challenge 2025
all_mega_events.description: A nationwide robotics competition hosted by IEEE NSU RAS SBC, featuring teams from universities across Bangladesh showcasing advanced autonomous robots.
all_mega_events.group_name: IEEE NSU Robotics & Automation Society Student Branch Chapter
